*Kit grumbles something about her being the leader and shouldn't take orders, but dismissed the thoughts. She transformed into robot mode and climbed onto Pegasus*

"And what exactly do you think your going to do?" *She half-laughs*

------Original Message------
From: "Joseph Frey" <jfrey1@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: May 18, 2000 10:48:37 PM GMT
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


Actually, I have something better.  Pegasus,  maximize!"  When Pegasus
transformed, the horn that was on his head was actually on his left hand.
Pegasus drilled his horn weapon into the side of the cliff next to the water
fall.  He stationed his feet on foot holds.

"Climb on," he instructed.
